TITLE: Bed Bath & Beyond's supply chain issues hammered results. Its stock is up anyway
SUMMARY: Bed Bath & Beyond CEO Mark Tritton said a lack of inventory due to supply chain bottlenecks cost Bed Bath & Beyond about $100 million.

TITLE: Walgreens shares give up gains after company warns of rising labor costs to keep up with Covid vaccines and tests
SUMMARY: Walgreens said it administered 15.6 million Covid vaccines in the latest quarter â€” bringing its total to more than 56 million to date.
